channel.title: Comments on: Heschel’s Heavenly Torah- Lost in Translation
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Harold Klein
item.dc:creator: Harold Klein
item.description: If one were to read Tucker's commentary closely you can see his urge to influence the reader to his (Tucker's) position - that is pointing out in his (Tucker's) opinion, citing's as to where AJH considered that the Torah may have been written by Man. In his effort to bring this incredible work to the masses of one he (Tucker) so admired, he contributed to a diminishing of his (Heschel's) importance.
item.content:encoded:
If one were to read Tucker’s commentary closely you can see his urge to influence the reader to his (Tucker’s) position – that is pointing out in his (Tucker’s) opinion, citing’s as to where AJH considered that the Torah may have been written by Man. In his effort to bring this incredible work to the masses of one he (Tucker) so admired, he contributed to a diminishing of his
(Heschel’s) importance.

item.title: By: Alan Brill
item.dc:creator: Alan Brill
item.description:

The articles are still online, but they transferred it to a new server http://www.yctorah.org/component/option,com_docman/task,doc_view/gid,312/
item.content:encoded:

The articles are still online, but they transferred it to a new server

item.title: By: Moshe
item.dc:creator: Moshe
item.description: Sadly Edah is no more and your review seems to be lost to the vagaries of the internet, any chance you will reprint it here?
item.content:encoded: Sadly Edah is no more and your review seems to be lost to the vagaries of the internet, any chance you will reprint it here?

item.title: By: lawrence kaplan
item.dc:creator: lawrence kaplan
item.description: I would be happy to redo the job if a rich "gevir" would be willing to sponsor me, and the legal isues could be sorted out.
item.content:encoded: I would be happy to redo the job if a rich “gevir” would be willing to sponsor me, and the legal isues could be sorted out.

item.title: By: thanbo
item.dc:creator: thanbo
item.description: I guess I'll have to bite the bullet and plow slowly through the Hebrew, then.
item.content:encoded: I guess I’ll have to bite the bullet and plow slowly through the Hebrew, then.
